workflow.name: Intelligent project delivery and task management system
workflow.description:
## How It Works
Automates daily project monitoring by fetching project data, analyzing tasks and team capacity with anthropic models, and generating resource optimization recommendations. Target audience: project managers, engineering leads, and resource planners managing complex team assignments. Problem solved: manual capacity planning misses bottlenecks; AI analysis identifies effort mismatches and delays proactively. Workflow runs daily checks, merges project and team profiles, analyzes tasks via multiple anthropic agents (breakdown, estimation, assignment), calculates effort allocation, detects delays, generates rebalancing recommendations, notifies stakeholders, and tracks milestones.

## Setup Steps
1. Configure daily trigger schedule. 
2. Connect project management system APIs. 
3. Set anthropic API keys with task analysis prompts. 
4. Enable email notifications for managers. 
5. Connect reporting database for tracking.

## Prerequisites
Anthropic API access, project management tool credentials, team capacity database 

## Use Cases
SaaS teams managing feature backlogs, consulting firms balancing client projects 

## Customization
Adjust effort estimation models. Add Slack notifications for urgency.  

## Benefits
Detects delays 2-3 weeks early, improves team utilization by 25%

workflow.name: Intelligent Project Delivery and Task Management System

options.systemMessage:
You are a Project Delivery Orchestrator that coordinates specialized AI agents to manage project delivery.

Your task is to:
1. Call the Task Breakdown Agent Tool to decompose the project into actionable tasks
2. Call the Effort Estimation Agent Tool to estimate effort for each task
3. Call the Task Assignment Agent Tool to assign tasks based on team skill profiles
4. Call the Progress Monitoring Tool to check current task progress
5. Call the Delay Detection Tool to identify any delays or risks
6. Return a comprehensive project plan with tasks, estimates, assignments, and status

Coordinate these tools in sequence and combine their outputs into a structured project delivery plan.

parameters.text: ={{ $fromAI('projectData', 'The project information to break down into tasks') }}

options.systemMessage:
You are a Task Breakdown Specialist. Analyze the project information and break it down into specific, actionable tasks.

For each task, identify:
- Task name and description
- Dependencies on other tasks
- Estimated complexity (low, medium, high)
- Required skills
- Milestone association

Return a structured list of tasks with all details.

parameters.toolDescription: Breaks down projects into actionable tasks with dependencies and milestones

parameters.text: ={{ $fromAI('tasks', 'The list of tasks to estimate effort for') }}

options.systemMessage:
You are an Effort Estimation Specialist. Analyze each task and provide realistic effort estimates.

For each task, estimate:
- Duration in hours
- Number of people required
- Start date (based on dependencies)
- End date
- Risk level (low, medium, high)

Consider task complexity, dependencies, and typical team velocity. Return structured estimates for all tasks.

parameters.toolDescription: Estimates effort and duration for each task based on complexity and team capacity

parameters.text: ={{ $fromAI('tasksAndTeam', 'Tasks with estimates and team member profiles') }}

options.systemMessage:
You are a Task Assignment Specialist. Match tasks to team members based on their skills and availability.

For each task, assign:
- Team member ID and name
- Assignment rationale (why this person)
- Workload percentage
- Backup assignee (if applicable)

Consider:
- Skill match with required skills
- Current workload and availability
- Task dependencies and timing
- Team member preferences and strengths

Return structured assignments for all tasks.

parameters.toolDescription: Assigns tasks to team members based on skills, availability, and workload

parameters.description: Monitors current progress of assigned tasks and calculates completion percentages
Detects tasks that are delayed or at risk of delay based on progress and deadlines

options.systemMessage:
You are a Task Reallocation Specialist. When delays are detected, you reassign tasks to optimize delivery.

Analyze:
- Delayed tasks and their impact
- Team member current workload
- Available team members with matching skills
- Task dependencies and critical path

Provide:
- Recommended task reassignments
- Rationale for each change
- Expected impact on timeline
- Risk mitigation strategies

Return structured reallocation recommendations.

parameters.content:
## How It Works
Automates daily project monitoring by fetching project data, analyzing tasks and team capacity with anthropic models, and generating resource optimization recommendations. Target audience: project managers, engineering leads, and resource planners managing complex team assignments. Problem solved: manual capacity planning misses bottlenecks; AI analysis identifies effort mismatches and delays proactively. Workflow runs daily checks, merges project and team profiles, analyzes tasks via multiple anthropic agents (breakdown, estimation, assignment), calculates effort allocation, detects delays, generates rebalancing recommendations, notifies stakeholders, and tracks milestones.

## Setup Steps
1. Configure daily trigger schedule. 
2. Connect project management system APIs. 
3. Set anthropic API keys with task analysis prompts. 
4. Enable email notifications for managers. 
5. Connect reporting database for tracking.

## Prerequisites
Anthropic API access, project management tool credentials, team capacity database 

## Use Cases
SaaS teams managing feature backlogs, consulting firms balancing client projects

## Customization
Adjust effort estimation models. Add Slack notifications for urgency.  

## Benefits
Detects delays 2-3 weeks early, improves team utilization by 25%

## Reporting & Notifications
**What:** Generate milestone reports, send status updates, track progress metrics.
**Why:** Stakeholder visibility enables proactive intervention before projects slip.

## Intelligent Rebalancing
**What:** Parse agent outputs, detect delays, flag bottlenecks, generate assignment recommendations.
**Why:** Automated rebalancing prevents schedule overruns and optimizes team utilization.

## Parallel AI Analysis
**What:** Anthropic agents analyze tasks (breakdown, effort estimation, optimal assignments) simultaneously.
**Why:** Parallel processing accelerates insights; multiple perspectives improve allocation accuracy.

## Data Integration
**What:** Daily triggers fetch project dates, team profiles, and task inventory from multiple sources.
**Why:** Real-time data ensures analysis reflects current project state and team capacity.

user.name: Cheng Siong Chin
user.bio: Dr. Cheng Siong CHIN is an n8n workflow creator specializing in AI-powered automation, agent orchestration, and intelligent system integrations. He designs and builds end-to-end workflows that combine LLMs, APIs, and data pipelines to streamline complex processes and deliver production-ready automation solutions. Contact me to discuss custom AI workflows and agent architectures.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
